title: A roadmap to coastal and marine ecological restoration in Australia
content:
Publication date: September 2024

Source: Environmental Science & Policy, Volume 159

Author(s): Megan I. Saunders, Toni Cannard, Mibu Fischer, Marian Sheppard, Alice Twomey, Rebecca Morris, Melanie J. Bishop, Mariana Mayer-Pinto, Fiona Malcolm, Maria Vozzo, Andy Steven, Stephen E. Swearer, Catherine E. Lovelock, Andrew W.M. Pomeroy, Ian McLeod, Nathan J. Waltham
